entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Peters Bay
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Peters 7:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: 6.3°C
Wind: SSW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow in the evening and ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
